issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Strong supporter of expanding healthcare access, protecting the Affordable Care Act, and reducing prescription drug costs

issues.title: Climate Change Action
issues.description: Advocates for aggressive climate change mitigation, supports Green New Deal principles, and renewable energy investments

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform, path to citizenship for undocumented immigrants, and protecting DACA recipients

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Supports increased federal education funding, student debt relief, and expanding access to higher education

issues.title: Social Security Protection
issues.description: Opposes privatization, supports expanding Social Security benefits and protecting current recipients

issues.title: Tax Reform
issues.description: Advocates for progressive taxation, closing corporate tax loopholes, and increasing taxes on high-income earners

issues.title: LGBTQ+ Rights
issues.description: Strong supporter of LGBTQ+ equality, anti-discrimination protections, and marriage equality
